text: P1 and P2 are discussing the demonstration to stop the spread of nuclear weapons. P1 suggests that P2 should attend the demonstration, but P2 declines, stating that he hates demonstrations and fears that the police will use tear gas. P1 mentions that North Korea has boasted about having nuclear weapons, and P2 expresses skepticism about the issue, stating that he does not understand the complexities of the situation and does not see the point of demonstrating. P1 suggests that standing up for what one believes in is a responsible citizen's duty, but P2 declines, stating that he plans to study for his physics exam and not get involved in the demonstration.
